sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog
  v-model="getShow"
  persistent
  max-width="720"
  >
    <v-card>
        Hi {{user.name}}
        <v-btn
        @click.prevent="closeUserProfile">
            close
        </v-btn>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'UserProfile',
    props:{
        showProfile:{
            type: Boolean,
            default: false,
            required: true
        },
        username: {
            type: String,
            default: '',
            required: true
        },
        useremail: {
            type: String,
            required
        },
        userimgsrc
    },
    computed:{
        getShow(){
            let localShow = this.showProfile
            return localShow
        }
    },
    methods: {
        closeUserProfile(){
            this.$emit('closeUserProfile',false)
        }
    },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
